duties_responsibilities.duty: Completes assigned work orders and preventative maintenance on the property.
Diagnoses the source or cause of defects or problems, and makes repairs in accordance with established policies.
Prepares vacant apartment homes for leasing and new move-ins by completing the pre-move-out inspection and maintenance tasks.
Supports cost-cutting and expense control programs by fixing rather than replacing parts when possible.
Assists in maintaining the grounds, common areas, and amenities by performing general cleaning and painting curbs and signage as needed.
